Package ch.psi.wica.controlsystem.epics

Class EpicsChannelGetAndPutService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.psi.wica.controlsystem.epics.EpicsChannelGetAndPutService

public class EpicsChannelGetAndPutService
extends java.lang.Object

      Constructors

      EpicsChannelGetAndPutService​(java.lang.String epicsCaLibraryMonitorNotifierImpl, int epicsCaLibraryDebugLevel, EpicsChannelValueGetter epicsChannelValueGetter)
      Returns a new instance that will extract information from the EPICS channels of interest using the supplied metadata and value getters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EpicsChannelGetAndPutService

        public EpicsChannelGetAndPutService​(@Value("${wica.epics-ca-library-monitor-notifier-impl}")
                                    java.lang.String epicsCaLibraryMonitorNotifierImpl,
                                    @Value("${wica.epics-ca-library-debug-level}")
                                    int epicsCaLibraryDebugLevel,
                                    @Autowired
                                    EpicsChannelValueGetter epicsChannelValueGetter)
        Returns a new instance that will extract information from the EPICS channels of interest using the supplied metadata and value getters.
        Parameters:
        epicsCaLibraryMonitorNotifierImpl - the CA library monitor notifier configuration.
        epicsCaLibraryDebugLevel - the CA library debug level.
        epicsChannelValueGetter - an object that can get and build the returned value.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public WicaChannelValue get​(EpicsChannelName epicsChannelName,
                            long timeout,
                            java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Gets the value of a channel. This method incurs the network cost of establishing a channel to the remote data source and performing a synchronous (=confirmed) GET operation.
        Parameters:
        epicsChannelName - the name of the channel.
        timeout - the timeout to be applied when attempting to get the channel value from the underlying data source. If a timeout occurs the returned value will be WicaChannelValueDisconnected.
        timeUnit - the time units to be used.
        Returns:
        the value.

      • put

        public boolean put​(EpicsChannelName epicsChannelName,
                   java.lang.String channelValue,
                   long timeout,
                   java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Sets the value of a channel. This method incurs the network cost of establishing a channel to the remote data source and performing a synchronous (= confirmed) PUT operation.
        Parameters:
        epicsChannelName - the channel name.
        channelValue - the channel value.
        timeout - the timeout to be applied when attempting to put the channel value to the underlying data source. If a timeout occurs the returned value will be false.
        timeUnit - the time units to be used.
        Returns:
        boolean set true when the put completed successfully.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
